Hi, I'm Matt

Web developer

High level experience creating websites from scratch. Eager to learn new technologies and apply them to solve real-world problems.

About Me

My Introduction

Web developer that has a passion for creating beautiful websites. I am most interested in design and animation. With 1 year experince in each front-end and back-end development, I am comfortable designing and implementing projects from start to finish.

A Few Highlights:

  • Graduated Cum Laude from University of Michigan College of Engineering.
  • Full stack web and mobile development.
  • Built REST API.
  • Designed and managed database.
  • Used Adobe Illustrator and After Effects to create animation for website.
